name: Creative Cooking & Baking
description: Explore new recipes and techniques in both savory cooking and sweet baking. Perfect for food enthusiasts of all levels.

name: Introduction to Game Development
description: Take your first steps into game development. Learn the basics of C# and the Unity engine to build your first 2D game.

name: Japanese for Travelers
description: Learn essential phrases and cultural etiquette for your next trip to Japan. Focus on practical, conversational skills.

name: Advanced Game Design with Unreal Engine
description: Dive deep into advanced game mechanics, level design, and photorealistic rendering with Unreal Engine 5.

name: Introduction to Graphic Design
description: Learn the core principles of visual communication, including typography, color theory, and layout design using modern tools.

name: Public Speaking & Presentation
description: Build your confidence and master the art of public speaking. Learn to craft and deliver compelling presentations.

name: Data Visualization with D3.js
description: Master the D3.js library to create powerful, interactive, and beautiful data visualizations for the web.

name: Digital Marketing Masterclass
description: A comprehensive guide to digital marketing, covering SEO, content marketing, and social media advertising strategies.

name: Mobile Photography for Beginners
description: Unlock the full potential of your smartphone camera. Learn composition, lighting, and editing techniques for stunning photos.

name: Introduction to Cloud Computing
description: Understand the fundamentals of cloud services, including IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS, with an introduction to AWS and Azure.

name: Music Production with Ableton
description: Learn to produce, record, and mix your own music from scratch using Ableton Live, a leading digital audio workstation.

name: Blockchain & Cryptocurrency 101
description: An essential introduction to the world of blockchain, distributed ledgers, and cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum.

name: Sustainable Living Workshop
description: Discover practical ways to reduce your carbon footprint, from zero-waste habits to urban gardening and composting.
